metadata.title: CVE-2023-39413 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple integer underflow vulnerabilities exist in the LXT2lxt2_rd_iter_radix shift operation functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. Aspecially crafted .lxt2 file can lead to memory corruption. A victim wouldneed to open a malicious file to trigger these vulnerabilities.Thisvulnerability concerns the integer underflow when performing the left shiftoperation.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
